name: 黃正民
objective: 本課程之教學目標在使學生瞭解數位訊號處理的理論基礎及其應用技巧。課程內容包含：(1)離散傅立葉轉換及快速傅立葉轉換 (2)Z-轉換在信號處理上之應用 (3)相關函數，迴旋積分及其應用 (4)FIR數位濾波器設計 (5)IIR數位濾波器設計 (6)適應性訊號處理介紹 (7)工程應用及實例研討。
schedule:
Week 1. Introduction
Week 2. Discrete-Time Signals and Systems
Week 3. Discrete-Time Fourier Transform
Week 4. Digital Processing of Continuous-Time Signals
Week 5. z-Transform
Week 6. z-Transform
Week 7. LTI Discrete-Time Systems in the Transform Domain
Week 8. LTI Discrete-Time Systems in the Transform Domain
Week 9. Midterm Exam
Week 10. IIR Digital Filter Design
Week 11. IIR Digital Filter Design
Week 12. FIR Digital Filter Design
Week 13. Digital Filter Structures
Week 14. Finite-Length Discrete Transform (DFT)
Week 15. DSP Algorithm Implementation
Week 16. Applications of DSP
Week 17. Applications of DSP
Week 18. Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Homework (with Matlab programming) 25%
Midterm Exam (closed book)         35%
Final Exam (closed book)           40%
materials:
-Textbook
Sanjit K. Mitra, Digital Signal Processing: A Computer-Based Approach, 4rd ed., McGraw-Hill Higher Educagion, 2006.
-Reference
Alan V. Oppenheim, Ronald W. Schafer, Discrete-Time Signal Processing, 3rd ed., Upper Saddle River: Pearson, 2010.
Joyce Van De Vegte, Fundamentals of Digital Signal Processing, Prentice Hall, 2001.
